Dashboard.title: AI Auto-Tagging in Progress
Dashboard.remainingTasks: Remaining {count} / {total} items, estimated {minutes} minutes to complete
Dashboard.emptyTagErrorMsg: No tag system yet. Please create one first~
Dashboard.noAppropriateTagErrorMsg: There are no suitable tags in the current tag system

Global.title: Tagging Switch
Global.enableTaggingDesc: Enabled, AI will tag assets based on configuration and tag system

TaggingMode.title: Tagging Mode
TaggingMode.directDesc: AI tags are applied directly to assets
TaggingMode.reviewDesc: AI tags require manual review before applying
TaggingMode.firstTimeRecommendationDesc: Manual review can help evaluate AI tagging effectiveness. Switch to direct application mode once accuracy meets requirements

MatchingStrategy.title: Matching Strategy
MatchingStrategy.existingTagsDesc: Match from existing tags in the system
MatchingStrategy.filePathMatchingDesc: Tag matching based on the file path where assets are located
MatchingStrategy.assetNameMatchingDesc: Analyze key information in file names for matching

TriggerTiming.title: Trigger Timing
TriggerTiming.autoRealtimeTaggingDesc: Execute AI intelligent parsing and automatic tagging immediately after file upload
TriggerTiming.manualTriggerTaggingDesc: Support users with edit permissions in the asset library to manually select files or folders for batch tagging
TriggerTiming.scheduledTaggingDesc: Scan untagged files periodically and automatically execute tagging

ApplicationScope.title: Application Scope
ApplicationScope.allAssetsDesc: Apply to all assets in the system
ApplicationScope.selectScopeDesc: Click to select the asset scope for enabling AI auto-tagging
ApplicationScope.currentAndNewAssets: Current folder and newly uploaded assets
ApplicationScope.onlySelectedScope: ðŸ’¡ Only assets within the selected scope will undergo AI auto-tagging

ConfirmDialog.enableWithoutTagsDescription: AI auto-tagging requires a tag system for intelligent tagging. There is currently no tag system in the system. Please create a tag system before enabling this feature~
ConfirmDialog.enableWithTagsDescription: AI will automatically analyze asset content based on your tag system and recommend suitable tags for assets. Recommended results will be displayed in the "AI Recommended Tags" field, and you can review and choose to apply them to formal tags.
ConfirmDialog.disableWithoutTasksDescription: After disabling, newly uploaded assets will no longer generate recommended tags based on your tag system.
ConfirmDialog.disableWithTasksDescription: There are currently {count} tagging tasks in progress, ongoing tasks will not be affected and will continue to complete. After disabling, newly uploaded assets will no longer generate recommended tags based on the tag system.
ConfirmDialog.enableHint: The system currently supports tagging based on general image recognition content by default
ConfirmDialog.disableHint: AI smart tags feature will still provide general content recognition for assets normally
ConfirmDialog.autoRealtimeOption: Generate recommended tags for newly uploaded assets
ConfirmDialog.autoRealtimeDescription: Uploaded assets will automatically get AI tag recommendations

Review.rejectConfirmDescription: Confirm to delete the AI tagging record of the asset "{assetName}"? This operation cannot be recovered, please proceed with caution.
Review.batchRejectConfirmDescription: Confirm to delete the AI tagging record of {assetNum} assets? This operation cannot be recovered, please proceed with caution.
Review.batchApproveSuccess: Batch added to asset tags successfully
Review.batchApproveFailed: Failed to batch add to asset tags
Review.batchRejectSuccess: Batch deleted AI tagging records successfully
Review.batchRejectFailed: Failed to batch delete AI tagging records
Review.enableAutoTaggingDesc: Enable AI auto-tagging engine now, automatically tag assets precisely based on tag system~
Review.pageInputPlaceholder: Enter page number, press Enter to jump

Access.noPermissionsConfigured: No other permissions configured. Click the "Add Members" button above to start configuration
Access.fullManagementPermission: Full management permissions, including configuration and member management
Access.reviewPermission: Can view and review tagging results, cannot modify configurations

Test.testOnlyDescription: For testing only, files and results will not be saved or entered into enterprise library
Test.noAssetsSelectedInfo: No assets selected or returned format is incorrect
Test.taggingTasksStarted: Successfully initiated tagging tasks for {successCount} assets
Test.taggingTasksPartialSuccess: Tagging task initiation completed: {successCount} successful, {failedCount} failed
Test.startTaggingError: Error occurred while initiating tagging tasks

TestClient.pollingDescription: Checking status every 2 seconds, results will be displayed automatically when completed

Common.taskAddedToQueue: Task has been added back to queue
